title: The title of this app
capchaSecret: Create one of these at https://www.google.com/recaptcha/intro/
gEmail: <Used only on back-end>. Gmail account to send emails from
gAppPassword: <Used only on back-end>. Visit this page for help on what this is. https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/185833?hl=en
recipientEmail: <Used only on back-end>. The email to send messages to. example.me@someemail.com
